body:
# My portfolio My name is [Brian Hoffman](http://twitter.com/brian_c_hoffman) * [Mindfulness in Plain English](http://www.urbandharma.org/pdf2/Mindfulness%20in%20Plain%20English%20Book%20Preview.pdf) - A free ebook on how and why to get started with meditation today * [Album of my DIY Workstation](http://imgur.com/a/BopF7) -
Ergonomic Battlestation
* [I Heart NY Museums](http://iheartnymuseums.com/) - A really old interactive map showing open/free hours at local museums A picture of Brian and Tiffany ![alt text](http://i.imgur.com/Kb4hWpX.jpg) Here's a tribute to Chesty's life:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
